scripts.build: concurrently "cd service && yarn build" "cd ui && yarn build"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd service && yarn lint" "cd ui && yarn lint"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd service && yarn dev" "cd ui && yarn dev"
scripts.sfw: concurrently "cd service && yarn sfw" "cd ui && yarn sfw"
scripts.test: concurrently "yarn depcheck" "cd service && yarn test" "cd ui && yarn test"
scripts.start: yarn build && cd service && yarn start
scripts.restart: yarn build && cd service && yarn restart
scripts.uninstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf service/node_modules && rm -rf ui/node_modules
